column4: how to open udp port to work with azureus it is showing DHT Firewalled i am using dapper 6.06
are you running a software firewall?
does it show NAT OK or NAT Error?
it's OK if your DHT is unreachable from the outside.  It would help you find peers if any of your torrent's trackers go down though.  It's not an Ubuntu-specific question though.
